page.title: 10CATHOLICISM IN CLEATOR MOOR
page.content: In Cleator Moor there are two main religions.The larger being Catholic and the smaller being Protestant. The Catholic children go to the catholic schools ST.PATRICK'S junior and Infant's.And the Protestant children go to Montreal juniors and Infants.The 11-18 Catholics go to ST.BENEDICT'S in Whitehaven.The rest go to EHENSIDE SCHOOL.In Cleator Moor. There are three priests.Their names are Father J.V.CAHALANE, Fr.P.HART and Fr.P.CHAPPELL. The Church is called ST.MARY'S.It is approx 120yrs old.There are approx 15 altar servers at St.Mary's church. The congregation is very generous and often donates large sums of money for whatever cause may arise.The congregation consists of over half the population of Cleator Moor.
